shortdesc.ph: Destroys the instance and releases related resources.

section.p: Call this method to release the instance and its related resources when real-time communication is no longer needed. The released resources can be used for other operations. It is recommended for scenarios where users occasionally make voice or video calls.

plentry.pd:
The callback triggered when the is destroyed, used to configure synchronous or asynchronous destruction:
Non-: Asynchronous destruction. The method returns immediately, and the engine resources may not be fully released. The engineReleasedBlock callback is triggered once the engine is fully destroyed.
: Synchronous destruction. The method returns only after the engine resources are fully released.

section.props: bp cs electron flutter rn unity unreal
section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: android bp cpp cs electron rn unity unreal
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
